attributes.action: Make transport free (or cheaper) for students under 18 during school time
attributes.additional_details: Education is a basic right. Everyone should have the opportunity to go to their dream school/college. This would ensure that all children have the ability to get to school and learn. Parents cannot always be there for kids and a safe way to get home can help with peace of mind. Additionally, seniors get cheaper transportation so it's unfair on students.
attributes.background: Some people cannot afford transportation to their school and parents cannot always drop off or pick up their kids.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727708
